TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Windows Form 控制項，可以用來裝載 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 項目。

span.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控制項放置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]上您[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制項或表單。Use the control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form. 主機[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]在中控制可[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，使用項目。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the element. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration.dll 會隨[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]組件。WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. 組件的預設位置是 %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. 主機[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在 Windows Form 中的項目，您必須指派[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目屬性。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the property. 使用屬性來指派自訂之間的對應控制項和其裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。Use the property to assign custom mappings between an control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 裝載 Windows Forms 中的 3d WPF 複合控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值指示裝載項目是否有透明背景。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

value.span: 如果裝載的項目有透明背景，就是 ，否則就是 。

span.span: if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您點陣圖複製，這讓裝載的項目，透過在裝載容器使用透明度。The property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container. 透過映像或漸層背景的項目時，這非常有用。This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background. 基於效能考量，屬性，會依預設已關閉。For performance reasons, the property is turned off by default.

summary.span: 取得或設定由 控制項所裝載的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.
The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以裝載只有一個項目，但可以有任意數目的子項目。Only one element can be hosted, but can have any number of child elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指派裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 裝載 Windows Forms 中的 3d WPF 複合控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 立即釋放 控制項所用的任何系統資源。

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

param.name: window
param.span: 要以非強制回應方式開啟的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 視窗。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

summary.span: 啟用 ，在以非強制回應的方式從 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 開啟時，可以正確接收鍵盤訊息。

span.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以轉送所有鍵盤訊息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]modelessly 開啟視窗。Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly. 方法會安裝中的訊息篩選器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]為基礎的應用程式。The method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application. 非強制回應視窗是作用中時，篩選會轉送所有鍵盤訊息。The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得所裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 項目的父容器。

span.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機容器是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，這是裝載的項目父容器。The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , which is the parent container for the hosted element. 在裝載容器一律為根目錄的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目階層架構。The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy. 若要存取的裝載的項目父代，存取直接。To access the parent of the hosted element, access directly.

in all cases.

Protected Overrides Sub OnEnabledChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法會將轉送到基底類別實作。The implementation of the method forwards to the base class implementation.

para.span: 不會覆寫這個實作方法。

span.span: Do not override this implementation of the method.

para.span: 控制項管理的裝載的項目，繪製和覆寫會造成無法預期的結果。

span.span: The control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding will cause unpredictable results.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPaintBackground(class System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs pevent) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnPaintBackground (pevent As PaintEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains information about the control to paint.

summary.span: 繪製控制項的背景。

span.span: Paints the background of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法到原來的 HBITMAP 繪製父控制項的背景。The method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP. 此點陣圖做為背景中裝載的項目用於支援透明度。This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency. 這個方法支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool ProcessCmdKey (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message msg, System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessCmdKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& msg, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef msg As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean
protected: override bool ProcessCmdKey(System::Windows::Forms::Message % msg, System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: msg
param.span: 由參考所傳遞的 ，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

span.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

summary.span: 處理命令鍵，確保所裝載的項目在正常 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 處理之前，有機會先處理這個命令。

span.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: 如果字元是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 快速鍵，就是 ，否則就是 。

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未處理按鍵訊息所裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，將它轉寄向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]類別階層進行處理。If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

Protected Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 處理助憶鍵字元，確保所裝載的項目在正常 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 處理之前，有機會先處理這個助憶鍵。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: 如果字元是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 快速鍵，就是 ，否則就是 。

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未處理按鍵訊息所裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，將它轉寄向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]類別階層進行處理。If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得屬性對應，以此判斷 控制項上的設定屬性如何影響所裝載的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 項目。

span.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

value.span: ，將 對應到所裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 項目上的屬性。

span.span: A that maps to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技術有兩個類似但不同屬性的模型。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models. *屬性對應*支援的兩個架構之間的互通性。*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以轉譯裝載的屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to translate the property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 使用 ElementHost 控制項對應屬性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md). [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

The scaling factor for the y-axis.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

param.name: directed
param.span: 以指定要選取控制項的方向，否則為 。

span.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

param.name: forward
param.span: 會在定位順序中向前移動。 會在定位順序中向後移動。

span.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

summary.span: 啟動裝載的項目。

span.span: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法啟動裝載的項目。The method activates the hosted element. 如果存在多個裝載的項目，第一個或最後一個元素已啟動，視`directed`和`forward`參數。If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters. 重複呼叫方法不會周遊裝載的項目。Repeated calls to the method do not traverse the hosted elements. 若要選取後續項目，請呼叫方法屬性。To select subsequent elements, call the method on the property. 此實作會將轉送的 tab 鍵，從[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]。This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
